sense.def:
To gain a quality
pomeni postopno dobiti neko lastnost.

seg.quote: The speaker began to gain confidence.
The opposition party is gaining in popularity.

sense.def:
To gain from something
pomeni od tistega imeti korist.

seg.quote: It is not only banks who will gain from the coming of electronic money.
What has Britain gained by being a member of the EEC?

sense.def:
A gain
je izboljšanje ali povečanje.

seg.quote: The company has made notable gains in productivity.

sense.def:
To do something for gain
pomeni nekaj storiti, da bi zase pridobili korist;

seg.quote: He did it for financial gain.

sense.def:
Kadar ura
is gaining
, se kazalci na številčnici pomikajo okoli nekoliko hitreje, kot bi se smeli.

To be gaining on someone or something
pomeni nekoga ali nekaj postopoma dohitevati.
